name: Sacrifice (itch) (KinraX)
description:
You're a servant of a mighty God on a tiny island in space. Your job is simple: sacrifice stuff to your master. So you build wheat, sheeps and trees, just to sacrifice them. But beware, before you can collect your stuff it might need a few days - probably longer then the evil god wants to wait... also he totally accidentally forgot to tell you how much of what he wants. Doesn't matter - you have one job to do. Build & Sacrifice.

Instructions

Buid stuff from the building menu (don't forget to place the things down). Wait a few days, they will slightly sparkle when they're ready to collect. Sacrifice stuff from your inventory (on top of screen) by visiting the altar.

Controls

Moving: WASD/Arrows/theoretically any X/Y axis.

BuildMenu: B

Build print: Left Click/Left Ctrl

Back to title screen: Esc (will be required when you fall of the island.

Sacrificing: Just go to the altar.

Note

There's a bug in the game that makes it possible you can get negative amounts of inventory items.
